name: surgery
description: The collection of data elements related to a donor's surgical treatment at a specific point in the clinical record. To submit multiple surgeries for a single donor, please submit multiple rows in the treatment file for this donor.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

fields.name: submitter_donor_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: submitter_treatment_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the treatment, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: procedure_type
fields.description: Indicate they type of surgical procedure that was performed.

codeList: Lymph node dissection performed at time of resection of primary

fields.name: biopsy_type
fields.description: If Biopsy was selected as the `procedure_type', indicate the type of biopsy that was performed.

fields.name: procedure_intent
fields.description: Indicate the intended disease outcome for which the procedure is given. (Reference: NCIt C124307)

fields.name: procedure_interval
fields.description: The interval between primary diagnosis and when the surgical procedure was performed, in days.

fields.name: procedure_site
fields.description: Indicate the ICD-O-3 topography code for the anatomic site where procedure was performed, according to the International Classification of Diseases for Oncology, 3rd Edition (WHO ICD-O-3).

meta.notes: Refer to the ICD-O-3 manual for guidelines at https://apps.who.int/iris/handle/10665/42344.

fields.name: procedure_site_other
fields.description: Free text to indicate additional details about the procedure site.

fields.name: procedure_location
fields.description: Indicate whether procedure was done on primary, local recurrence or metastatic location.

fields.name: tumour_size_status
fields.description: Indicate if tumour size was determined during the procedure.

fields.name: tumour_length
fields.description: Indicate the length of the tumour, in mm.

fields.name: tumour_width
fields.description: Indicate the width of the tumour, in mm.

fields.name: total_tumour_size
fields.description: Indicate the total tumour size, in mm.

fields.name: tumour_focality
fields.description: Indicate the tumour focality, the definition of the limitaion to a specific area of a tumour.

fields.name: margin_status
fields.description: Indicate if intraoperative margins were involved.

fields.name: proximal_margin
fields.description: Indicate if proximal margin is involved.

fields.name: distal_margin
fields.description: Indicate if distal margin is involved.

fields.name: circumferential_resection_margin
fields.description: Indicate if circumferential margin is involved.

fields.name: lymphovascular_invasion
fields.description: Indicate whether lymphovascular invasion (LVI) has occurred.

codeList: Lymphatic and small vessel invasion only
Both lymphatic and small vessel and venous (large vessel) invasion

fields.name: perineural_invasion
fields.description: Indicate whether perineural invasion has occurred.

fields.name: microvenous_invasion
fields.description: Indicate whether microvenous invasion has occurred.

fields.name: intraoperative_findings
fields.description: Indicate other additional intraoperative findings.

fields.name: common_bile_duct_margin
fields.description: Indicate if common bile duct margin is involved.

fields.name: unicinate_margin
fields.description: Indicate if unicinate margin (retroperitoneal/superior mesenteric artery) is involved.

fields.name: periuncinate_margin
fields.description: Indicate if periuncinate margin is involved.

fields.name: pancreatic_carcinoma_groove_margin
fields.description: Indicate if pancreatic carcinoma groove margin is involved.

fields.name: state_of_pv_smv
fields.description: Indicate the state of portal vein and/or superior mesenteric vein.

fields.name: state_of_pma
fields.description: Indicate the state of superior mesenteric artery.

fields.name: state_of_duodenal
fields.description: Indicate the state of duodenal involvement.

fields.name: state_of_common_bile_duct
fields.description: Indicate the state of common bile duct involvement

meta.displayName: State of Common Bile Duct Involvement
